---
title: "Introduction"
description: "Cerebrium is an AWS Sagemaker alternative providing all the features you need to
quickly build a ML product."
---

Our goal is to help companies create value through machine learning as quickly and as painlessly as possible by abstracting away a lot of the complexity and mundane infrastructure setup.

Sagemaker is feature rich, so we are developing the most requested functionality
weekly based on your feedback. You can send us feedback requests at
[support@cerebrium.ai](mailto:support@cerebrium.ai)

<Card
  title="Get started"
  icon="circle-play"
  href="https://dashboard.cerebrium.ai"
>
  Start a project and deploy your first model.
</Card>

## Start with a framework

Cerebrium integrates with all your favourite frameworks
